draw

public int draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                int pageIndex)
Description copied from class: PageDrawer
Draws the page.

Specified by:
draw in class PageDrawer
Parameters:
graphics - the context into which the page is drawn
pageIndex - the zero based index of the page to be drawn
Returns:
PAGE_EXISTS if the page is rendered successfuly or NO_SUCH_PAGE if pageIndex specifies a non-existent page.
